anonymousId.description: A pseudo-unique substitute for a User ID, for cases when you donâ€™t have an absolutely unique identifier. A userId or an anonymousId is required.

context.description: Dictionary of extra information that provides useful context about a message, but is not directly related to the API call like ip address or locale

integrations.description: Dictionary of destinations to either enable or disable

messageId.description: Automatically collected by Segment, a unique identifier for each message that lets you find an individual message across the API

receivedAt.description: Automatically set by Segment, the timestamp of when a message is received by Segment

sentAt.description: Timestamp of when a message is sent to Segment, used for clock skew correction

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the message itself took place, defaulted to the current time by the Segment Tracking API

type.description: Type of message, corresponding to the API method: 'identify', 'group', 'track', 'page', 'screen' or 'alias'

userId.description: Unique identifier for the user in your database

version.description: Version of the Tracking API that received the message, automatically set by Segment
